title: 90/14/EEC: Commission Decision of 20 December 1989 drawing up a list of third countries from which Member States authorize importation of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species
header:
COMMISSION  DECISION
of 20 December 1989
drawing up a list of third countries from which Member States authorize importation of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species
(90/14/EEC)
THE COMMISSION OF THE EUROPEAN COMMUNITIES
main_body: The importation of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species is allowed only from those third countries which appear on the list in the Annex to this Decision.
This Decision is addressed to the Member States.
attachments:
Done at Brussels, 20 December 1989.
For the Commission
Ray MAC SHARRY
Member of the Commission
(1) OJ No L 194, 22. 7. 1988, p. 10.
ANNEX
List of third countries from which Member States authorize importation of deep-frozen semen of domestic animals of the bovine species
1.2 // Australia Austria Canada Czechoslovakia Finland Hungary New Zealand   // Poland Romania Sweden Switzerland United States of America Yugoslavia
